00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase;
00006 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase.AlterTableVisitor;
00007 import liquibase.database.sql.*;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;

00011 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;

00013 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;

00020 
00024 public class AddColumnChange extends AbstractChange implements ChangeWithColumns {
00025 
00026     private String schemaName;
00027     private String tableName;
00028     private List<ColumnConfig> columns;
00029 
00030     public AddColumnChange() {
00031         super("addColumn", "Add Column");
00032         columns = new ArrayList<ColumnConfig>();
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getSchemaName() {
00036         return schemaName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00040         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00041     }
00042 
00043     public String getTableName() {
00044         return tableName;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00048         this.tableName = tableName;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public List<ColumnConfig> getColumns() {
00052         return columns;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public ColumnConfig getLastColumn() {
00056         return (columns.size() > 0) ? columns.get(columns.size() - 1) : null;
00057     }
00058 
00059     public void addColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00060         columns.add(column);
00061     }
00062 
00063     public void removeColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00064         columns.remove(column);
00065     }
00066 
00067     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00068         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tableName) == null) {
00069             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("tableName is required", this);
00070         }
00071 
00072         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00073             if (StringUtils.trimToNull(column.getName()) == null) {
00074                 throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("column name is required", this);
00075             }
00076             if (StringUtils.trimToNull(column.getType()) == null) {
00077                 throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("column type is required", this);
00078             }
00079 
00080 
00081         }
00082 
00083 
00084     }
00085 
00086     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00087         
00088 //      if (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) {
00089 //              // return special statements for SQLite databases
00090 //              return generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(database);
00091 //        }
00092         
00093         List<SqlStatement> sql = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00094 
00095         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00096         for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00097             Set<ColumnConstraint> constraints = new HashSet<ColumnConstraint>();
00098             if (aColumn.getConstraints() != null) {
00099                 if (aColumn.getConstraints().isNullable() != null && !aColumn.getConstraints().isNullable()) {
00100                     constraints.add(new NotNullConstraint());
00101                 }
00102                 if (aColumn.getConstraints().isPrimaryKey() != null && aColumn.getConstraints().isPrimaryKey()) {
00103                     constraints.add(new PrimaryKeyConstraint(aColumn.getConstraints().getPrimaryKeyName()));
00104                 }
00105             }
00106             if (aColumn.isAutoIncrement() != null && aColumn.isAutoIncrement()) {
00107                 constraints.add(new AutoIncrementConstraint(aColumn.getName()));
00108             }
00109 
00110             AddColumnStatement addColumnStatement = new AddColumnStatement(schemaName,
00111                     getTableName(),
00112                     aColumn.getName(),
00113                     aColumn.getType(),
00114                     aColumn.getDefaultValueObject(),
00115                     constraints.toArray(new ColumnConstraint[constraints.size()]));
00116 
00117             sql.add(addColumnStatement);
00118 
00119             if (aColumn.getValueObject() != null) {
00120                 UpdateStatement updateStatement = new UpdateStatement(schemaName, getTableName());
00121                 updateStatement.addNewColumnValue(aColumn.getName(), aColumn.getValueObject());
00122                 sql.add(updateStatement);
00123             }
00124         }
00125 
00126 //        for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00127 //            if (aColumn.getConstraints() != null) {
00128 //                if (aColumn.getConstraints().isPrimaryKey() != null && aColumn.getConstraints().isPrimaryKey()) {
00129 //                    AddPrimaryKeyChange change = new AddPrimaryKeyChange();
00130 //                    change.setSchemaName(schemaName);
00131 //                    change.setTableName(getTableName());
00132 //                    change.setColumnNames(aColumn.getName());
00133 //
00134 //                    sql.addAll(Arrays.asList(change.generateStatements(database)));
00135 //                }
00136 //            }
00137 //        }
00138 
00139         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00140             sql.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(schemaName, getTableName()));
00141         }
00142 
00143         return sql.toArray(new SqlStatement[sql.size()]);
00144     }
00145     
00146     private SqlStatement[] generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(Database database) 
00147                         throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00148 
00149                 // SQLite does not support this ALTER TABLE operation until now.
00150                 // For more information see: http://www.sqlite.org/omitted.html.
00151                 // This is a small work around...
00152         
00153         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00154         
00155         // define alter table logic
00156                 AlterTableVisitor rename_alter_visitor = 
00157                 new AlterTableVisitor() {
00158                         public ColumnConfig[] getColumnsToAdd() {
00159                                 ColumnConfig[] columnsToAdd = new ColumnConfig[columns.size()];
00160                                 for (int i=0;i<columns.size();i++) {
00161                                         columnsToAdd[i] = new ColumnConfig(columns.get(i));
00162                                 }
00163                                 return columnsToAdd;
00164                         }
00165                         public boolean copyThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00166                                 return true;
00167                         }
00168                         public boolean createThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00169                                 return true;
00170                         }
00171                         public boolean createThisIndex(Index index) {
00172                                 return true;
00173                         }
00174                 };
00175                 
00176         try {
00177                 // alter table
00178                         statements.addAll(SQLiteDatabase.getAlterTableStatements(
00179                                         rename_alter_visitor,
00180                                         database,getSchemaName(),getTableName()));
00181                 } catch (JDBCException e) {
00182                         System.err.println(e);
00183                         e.printStackTrace();
00184                 }
00185         
00186         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00187         
00188     }
00189 
00190     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00191         List<Change> inverses = new ArrayList<Change>();
00192 
00193         for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00194             if (aColumn.hasDefaultValue()) {
00195                 DropDefaultValueChange dropChange = new DropDefaultValueChange();
00196                 dropChange.setTableName(getTableName());
00197                 dropChange.setColumnName(aColumn.getName());
00198 
00199                 inverses.add(dropChange);
00200             }
00201 
00202 
00203             DropColumnChange inverse = new DropColumnChange();
00204             inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00205             inverse.setColumnName(aColumn.getName());
00206             inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00207             inverses.add(inverse);
00208         }
00209 
00210         return inverses.toArray(new Change[inverses.size()]);
00211     }
00212 
00213     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00214         List<String> names = new ArrayList<String>(columns.size());
00215         for (ColumnConfig col : columns) {
00216             names.add(col.getName() + "(" + col.getType() + ")");
00217         }
00218 
00219         return "Columns " + StringUtils.join(names, ",") + " added to " + tableName;
00220     }
00221 
00222     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00223         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("addColumn");
00224         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00225             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00226         }
00227         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00228 
00229         for (ColumnConfig col : getColumns()) {
00230             Element subNode = col.createNode(currentChangeLogFileDOM);
00231             node.appendChild(subNode);
00232         }
00233 
00234         return node;
00235     }
00236 
00237     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00238         List<DatabaseObject> result = new ArrayList<DatabaseObject>(columns.size());
00239 
00240         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00241         result.add(table);
00242         for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00243             Column each = new Column();
00244             each.setTable(table);
00245             each.setName(aColumn.getName());
00246             result.add(each);
00247         }
00248 
00249         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(result);
00250     }
00251 }
